org.anchoranalysis.io.output.path.prefixer

Class PathPrefixerContext

  • Object
    • PathPrefixerContext

  • public class PathPrefixerContext
extends Object
    Context parameters provided to a link PathPrefixer.
    Author:
    Owen Feehan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PathPrefixerContext()
      Create with default parameters.
      PathPrefixerContext(boolean debugMode, Optional<Path> outputDirectory, boolean outputIncrementingNumberSequence)
      Create with specific parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<Path> getOutputDirectory()
      A directory indicating where inputs can be located.
      boolean isDebugMode()
      Whether debug-mode is activated.
      boolean isOutputIncrementingNumberSequence()
      Requests outputting with an incrementing number sequence, rather than the usual outputter (normally based upon input filenames).

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PathPrefixerContext

        public PathPrefixerContext()
                    throws PathPrefixerException
        Create with default parameters.
        Throws:
        PathPrefixerException

      • PathPrefixerContext

        public PathPrefixerContext(boolean debugMode,
                           Optional<Path> outputDirectory,
                           boolean outputIncrementingNumberSequence)
                    throws PathPrefixerException
        Create with specific parameters.
        Parameters:
        debugMode - whether debug-mode is activated
        outputDirectory - a directory indicating where inputs can be located.
        outputIncrementingNumberSequence - requests outputting with an incrementing number sequence, rather than the usual outputter (normally based upon input filenames).
        Throws:
        PathPrefixerException - if the the path in outputDirectory is relative instead of absolute

    • Method Detail

        Whether debug-mode is activated.

        A directory indicating where inputs can be located.

      • isOutputIncrementingNumberSequence

        public boolean isOutputIncrementingNumberSequence()
        Requests outputting with an incrementing number sequence, rather than the usual outputter (normally based upon input filenames).
